author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 35-year-old woman, Vidya (35), succumbed to her burns on Friday after her husband allegedly set her on fire in Gandhipuram, Vysarapadi on Tuesday night.

According to police, her husband Armugam admitted her at the hospital claiming that she had attempted self-immolation. Subsequently, it came to light that he had set her ablze following an argument. Arumugam was arrested.
title: Wife set on fire by husband, dies
